revision.text:
= Wednesday February 21, 2007 =
==Session 1 ==
'''0900-1000 OPeNDAP Current Status'''
* [[Media:Friday_summary.ppt| Introduction by Peter Fox, President of OPeNDAP]] ([[Media:Friday_summary.pdf | PDF]]) '''1000-1015 Break'''
==Session 2 (moderator: P. Fox) ==
'''1015-1200 The OPeNDAP 4 Data Server (aka ''Hyrax'')''' <!-- (20 minutes each) -->
* James Gallagher and Nathan Potter - [[Media:Hyrax-introduction-customization-02.21.2007.ppt | Customizing and Extending Hyrax]] * Patrick West - [[Media:OPeNDAP_Workshop_BES.ppt | Harnessing the power of the Server 4 Back-End Server modular framework]] * Jose H. Garcia - [[Media:GRID_OPENDAP.ppt | Numerical Grid Computations with the OPeNDAP Back End Server (BES)]] * Patrick West - [[Media:OPeNDAP_Workshop_SSL.ppt | OPeNDAP Server 4 Back-End Server Authentication and Authorization]]
==Lunch 1215-1330 ==
==Session 3 (moderator: P. Cornillon) ==
'''1330-1530 Security''' <!-- (20 minutes each) -->
* John Relph and Kenneth S. Casey - [[Media:OPeNDAP_Security_Feb2007.ppt | Software Development and Security at NOAA]] * John Caron - [[Media:OpendapSecurity.ppt | The THREDDS Data Server and OPeNDAP security]] * Tim Pugh - [http://wiki.opendap.org/twiki/pub/Developers/DevMeeting2007Program/2007_OPeNDAP_Dev_Meeting_BMRC.ppt | BMRCs OPeNDAP data service, how far can it reach?] * Discussion
'''1530-1545 Break'''
==Session 4 (moderator: J. Gallagher) ==
'''1545-1730 Semantics''' <!-- (20 minutes each) -->
* Benno Blumenthal- [[Media:OpenDAP2007.ppt | Using an RDF framework to carry metadata for datasets]] * Rob Raskin - [[Media:Sweet-opendap.ppt | SWEET - an upper-level ontology for Earth and Space Sciences]] * (withdrawn) Luis Bermudez - [[Media:Semanticsandopendap.pdf | MMI and CF]] * Peter Fox - [http://wiki.opendap.org/twiki/pub/Developers/DevMeeting2007Program/OPeNDAPSemantics_Fox_20070221.ppt | OPeNDAP and semantics] * Discussion
==Dinner ==
No-host dinner, Cafe Gondolier
= Thursday February 22, 2007 =
==Session 5 (moderator: D. Holloway) ==
'''0900-1030 APIs and Clients''' <!-- (30 minutes each) -->
* Roberto De Almeida - [[Media:OPeNDAPDevelopersMeeting2007_Python.ppt | Data Access Protocol meets Python]] <!-- * James Gallagher - Using the OPeNDAP C++ and Java Bindings --> * Peter Cornillon - [[Media:2007-02-DevelopersMeeting.pdf|The Matlab OPeNDAP GUI Suite]]
'''1030-1100 Break'''
* Poster: Denis Nadeau - [[Media:OPeNDAP_nadeau_2.jpg|Enhancing Access to NASA Satellite Data OGC Web Services using OPeNDAP.]]
==Session 5 continued ==
'''1100-1215 APIs and Clients (continued)'''
* John Chamberlain - [[Media:2007_DevWorkshop_Chamberlain.ppt|OPeNDAP: User Versus Programmatic Access]] * Greg Janee - [[Media:janee.pdf|Data Discovery in a Distributed Environment]] and [[Media:janee-hardy.pdf|Darren Hardy's AGU presentation]].
==Lunch 1215-1315 ==
==Session 6 (moderator: P. Cornillon) ==
'''1315-1445 Data Providers'''
* Roy Mendelssohn - OPeNDAP at ERD with suggestions for future development * Jim Potemra - [http://wiki.opendap.org/twiki/pub/Developers/DevMeeting2007Program/APDRCOPeNDAP.ppt | IPRC data transport, LAS and EPIC server] * Christopher Lynnes - [[Media:OpenDAP07.ppt|OPeNDAP Developments at the Goddard Earth Sciences DISC]] * Thomas LOUBRIEU - [[Media:boulder-mersea-opendap.ppt|OPeNDAP in European oceanography data management]]
==Session 7 (moderator: N. Potter) ==
'''1445-1715 Server-Side Operations with 1530-1600 Break''' <!-- (20 minutes each) -->
* Wenli Yang - [[Media:OPeNDAPDevelopersMeeting2007WCS.ppt|The ROSES ACCESS OPeNDAP/OGC Gateway Project]] * Roland Schweitzer - [[Media:RHS-OPeNDAP_Dev_Con.ppt|Server-side OPeNDAP Analysis - A General Approach Utilizing Legacy Applications through TDS]] * Daniel L. Wang - [[Media:sld_WZJ07b.pdf|Server-side Data Reduction and Analysis with Script Workflow Analysis for MultiProcessing (SWAMP)]] * Thomas LOUBRIEU - [[Media:boulder-dap4cor_presentation.ppt|Dap4cor: A Dapper-like server for CORIOLIS in-situ data centre]]
==Dinner ==
Dinner on your own
= Friday February 23, 2007 =
==Session 9 (moderator: P. Fox) ==
'''0900-0930 Server-side functions (continued)'''
* James Gallagher - [[Media:Server-side-functions-02.22.2007.ppt|Server-side Functions for Geo-spatial Selection]]
'''0930-1200 Strategies and Directions'''
* Peter Fox - [[Media:Friday.ppt|Discussion (with nominal time allocations) focusing on...]] ** community forums for deciding on standards processes within (and beyond) the OPeNDAP community, who is involved, timeframe, prototypes, etc. (1hr) ** security (20min) ** semantics (profiles, vocabularies) (20min) ** server-side (aggregation) (20min) ** response types (e.g. get_capabilities) (20min) ** metrics (10min) ** others: gateways, Server4, TDS and other general direction issues
==Lunch ==
==Hyrax Tutorial (FL2/1001) ==
'''1300-1630'''
